episodes.title: Triforce! #36: This Stupid Planet
episodes.summary:
Lewis, Sips and Pyrion are back for another Triforce! The discovery of Trappist-1 has led our guys on a massive science ramble which, of course, leads to Star Trek.

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #35: Valentine Conspiracies
episodes.summary:
A botched Valentine's Day, creepy conspiracies and grown men having a good cry every now and then. Triforce is back!

Get a Bodega t-shirt from here: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #34: I Don't Care What You Did Last Summer
episodes.summary:
Pyrion in a police line-up, the addiction of gaming, twitch-bans and Simpsons pre-season 10! It's the Triforce Podcast!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #33: Famous for Nothing
episodes.summary:
Celebrity Big Brother, non-celebrities and watching Pyrion nap. It's the Triforce Podcast!

Get a Bodega t-shirt from here: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #32: Putu, Putu and You, Too
episodes.summary:
Look after the old, watch out for angry cocks, haggle hard and most importantly: Remember that Sips is a pu55y. We're back in the Triforce Podcast!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #31: No One Creepin' On Me
episodes.summary:
Today's podcast features our old teachers, Pyrion's mum (who can see dildos everywhere) and the response from our previous episode!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #30 - Ult Me, Baby
episodes.summary:
In this weeks Triforce we're getting a little steamy with Overwatch porn, fetishes and used footwear!

The new Bodega t-shirt is out now: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #29: Chill Resolutions
episodes.summary:
It's the first Triforce of 2017! Today we're talking about our hopes, dreams, resolutions and the stupidity of it all!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #28: Reassuring Boner
episodes.summary:
Triforce is back with a special guest, Duncan! Recorded in front of a Livestream audience we're looking back through our lives, striving to remember our first boner.

The new Bodega t-shirt is out now: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #27 - Biff, Chip and Floppy
episodes.summary:
New-age schools, lazy christmas, Pyrion's saucy letters and Bodega Part Ocho! More of the Triforce THE Podcast!

The new Bodega t-shirt is out now: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #26: Boonos Aires
episodes.summary:
Everybody hates Raymond, a hobo Christmas, being traumatised by Planet Earth. It's the Triforce podcast!
The new Bodega t-shirt is out now: http://bit.ly/BodegaTee

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #25: Good Days Gone By
episodes.summary:
Kids stuck in fridges, dads stuck at parties, us stuck in the good ol' days. Top that off with a hint of Hitler and you've got yourself a Triforce Podcast!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound.

episodes.title: Triforce! #24: Call Sign of the Triforce
episodes.summary:
A secret codeword for the Triforce, XCom, Hearts of Iron, Zen Lewis and the beginning of Bodega Series 2 (we think)! The Triforce podcast!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound!

episodes.title: Triforce! #23: No More Micro
episodes.summary:
We talk about poop and weiners before we talk about games and then Bodega. That's as good a formula as you're gonna get on the Triforce Podcast!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #22: Prepping For Disaster
episodes.summary:
What would you do in a disaster? Would you black out? Sips would!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #21: What Happened to Robert Redford?
episodes.summary:
Robert Redford has some indecent proposals for the guys! We're also back with our Homebrew Sci-Fi segment of the podcast with Bodega Part Dos!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #20: Bodega Part Uno
episodes.summary:
The ultimate of dad chat commences with stamps, smoking and the optimal methods for naps. Pyrion has also prepared Part Uno of Bodega's Space Adventure!

 

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #19: Homebrew Fanfiction
episodes.summary:
The intricacies of Artificial Intelligence, Deanna Troi in a mud-wrestling battle against herself and the first issue of Pyrion's homebrew fanfiction - Bodega Dives To The Right. Triforce is back, baby!

 

Production music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #18: Fat Man's Burger Limbo

We've got the WoW fever but we're going to do whatever we can to not talk about it. Instead we're going to talk about the first episode of Sips' nature documentary!


Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #17: Waking Up Sexy
episodes.summary:

Music courtesy of Epidemic Sound

episodes.title: Triforce! #1: Sell Your Kids

episodes.title: YoGPoD 35: Christmas Special 2010

episodes.title: YoGPoD 34: Fridge Tax
episodes.summary: In the first YoGPoD for a while, Simon and Lewis discuss many topics - from terrible jokes to multi-shot.

episodes.title: Nordrassil Radio Interview (uncut, long!)

episodes.title: YoGPoD 33: My mum bought me a troll...
episodes.summary: After a short break, Simon and Lewis go through some of your letters, getting confused and then questioning the sanity and general intelligence of yognau(gh)ts.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 32: I am Michael Macdonald and I listen to the yogpod all day
episodes.summary: The ghost of Gary Coleman pops in as Lewis and Simon play the terrible fan-made liners, discuss expensive liquids and set a high-flying brand new challenge!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 31: D&D2 - I'm Just Making A Camp Guys (Part 1)
episodes.summary: This time, Lewis is the Dungeon Master - and Simon, Hannah, Sips and Mulchie must take their first steps into a brand new adventure which incidentally has neither dungeons nor dragons in it at all!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 30b: Simon, Simon, come and drink the tea of the Inca people
episodes.summary: The concluding part of our Special 30-Year Anniversary Election 2010 Special Exclusive YoGPoD. Featuring Simon discussing how he would host a dinner party in Come Dine With Me, and details of Simon's Babysitting Company.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 30a: IM THIRTY-TWO YEARS OLD
episodes.summary: A special two-part 30th episode celebrating our 30-year anniversary of the yogpod. In this episode, Simon meets a famous person and makes a fool of himself.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 29: SCRAMMMBLED
episodes.summary: Brian Blessed pops into the show, Simon and Lewis hunt for Warwick Davis and talk about Dr Who, Teletubbies and all sorts of various bumph.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 28: I'm just putting the Daz in the sink
episodes.summary: Fizzy drink cans, conspiracy theories about 1956, incredibly waffly letters, bum-chat, celebrity guests, lag and the usual drivel you know and love! :D

episodes.title: YoGPoD 27: Warwick Davis Exclusive Interview
episodes.summary: Back from our short hiatus, Lewis and Simon begin the new season of the YoGPoD with the usual high quality chat, exclusive interviews, letter from fans and the rest.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 26: Your Grandad Was A Bee?
episodes.summary: A bumper-packed chocolatey podcast filled with usually jammy nonsense, specially made and lovingly prepared by Simon and Lewis.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 25: Chess Boxing and Other New Years Party Games
episodes.summary: Simon and Lewis welcome you into the new decade with a lovely scrummy podcast. Featuring an extended Letters From The Yognauts section with plenty of your terrible e-mails. We love you all!!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 24: Christmas at Poundland
episodes.summary: Happy Yogmas, and a very yoggy New Year to you all! Thanks for listening to our podcast this year, so here's a special episode we threw together for you.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 23: Simon's Cheesecake Surprise
episodes.summary: In the only official monster truck podcast, you'll find talk about the history of Jägermeister, snoring, and how to make the most delicious of cheesecakes.

episodes.title: Icecrown Preview Vid is up!
episodes.summary: Enjoy :)

episodes.title: YoGPoD 22: Thai Fish in a Bag
episodes.summary: A Katy Perry cover, Hannah shows us how to cook to get laid, and we go through some of your terrible e-mails.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 21: Halloween Spacktacular
episodes.summary: OooOoooooOoooooOoooo! It's the super-spooky halloween edition of the YoGPoD, this time actually released at the correct time of year!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 20: Miss, have you got any Dostoevsky?
episodes.summary: Which celebrity would you like as your headmaster, and who would you be at a murder mystery?

episodes.title: The first two D&D podcasts are hosted here...
episodes.summary:
Along with all our old stuff :)

http://feeds2.feedburner.com/Yogscast-TheYogpod

episodes.title: YoGPoD 19: Dungeons & Dragons Part III
episodes.summary: The concluding part of the great chronicles of Brick, Madeowyn, Dylan, Barry and Bubbles as they track down the source of the evil at the Icy Spire!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 18: You put the boom boom into the durr
episodes.summary: Milkmen, ricicles, songs about werewolves and vyrian reviews District 9!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 17: Don't they just go down to their undies
episodes.summary: Simon is adventuring in London, so I ask him a lot of random questions while he talks into his laptop in his friends lounge.

episodes.title: YoGFooT details and other stuff
episodes.summary:
Sign up here: http://fantasy.premierleague.com then click on Leagues, and Join private league and type this code: 349295-157596

Donate to help us keep going! Clickies over below the twitter thingy on the left.

The marvellous Professor Poliakoff mentions us in his latest video (at the end): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K_5wK95Nvk8

In other news, cow tetris is actually a real game (sigh rule 34 of the internet) http://nonsense.wglick.org/cowtris.html but we didn't realise this until after we recorded the podcast.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 16: Boobles, Man-man, Cowboy MMO and floating Jaffas
episodes.summary: Jam-packed with nonsense this week, with topics from cow tetris to fantasy football.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 15: Halloween Special
episodes.summary: This is the YoGPoD HALLOWEEN SPECIAL (in August). In which we discuss scary stories, and whatever the hell else we usually talk about. You know the drill.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 14: Xephos' War Stories
episodes.summary: Electrocution, hitting people with axes and holding your poo for a week are in today's exciting new episode!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 13: The Last Watch
episodes.summary: Embark on an exciting adventure as Honeydew reads from Xephos's World of Warcraft fan fiction. Hold on to your buttocks!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 12: Dungeons & Dragons Part II
episodes.summary: Pack your magical whistles and conjured mana bread, we're going on another adventure into the land of dungeons! and dragons! OH MY!

episodes.title: YoGPoD 11: Xephos is lazy and never provides a title or summary
episodes.summary: In this classic episode, Lewis bores Simon with anecdotes and they talk about the usual bumfluff.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 10: Hanging to the left
episodes.summary: A classic podcast in which Yohi or Drahl or someone discusses the phenomenon in which one's banana and oranges tends to drift in a specific direction depending on your sexual orientation.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 9: Dungeons & Dragons Part I
episodes.summary: The quest begins, and our mighty heroes take their first steps into unknown lands filled with creepy characters and strange weather patterns.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 8: Dave Yogpod
episodes.summary: I am Dave! Yognaut

episodes.title: YoGPoD 7: The Dragon Quiz
episodes.summary: Simon goes through an extremely nerdy quiz to find out how much Lewis knows about dragons.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 6: Zombies and Drugs
episodes.summary: Simon and Lewis discuss the dangers of zombie apocalypse and the lingo used by drug dealers.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 5: The LHC and politics
episodes.summary: A Pakistani Frenchmen calls tech support at the LHC because it's broken.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 4: Na na na, nana na naa na
episodes.summary: The guys cover the usual bum chat with generous amounts of fluff and singing.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 3: Toaster Bags and Tina Barrett
episodes.summary: As usual, Simon and Lewis discuss a wide variety of drivel.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 2: Sipsgate
episodes.summary: Sips, a Canadian man who lives on an island in the English Channel, gets phoned up by two idiots that he knows from an internet game.

episodes.title: YoGPoD 1: Snowcast
episodes.summary: The first episode of the YoGPoD is recorded from snowed-in Great Britain during a freezing February afternoon.
